author: arfrever
msg: * configure.ac
(SQLITE_ALLOWED_PATTERN): Fix regex.

author: gstein
msg: Link changelists back into the schema.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc-metadata.sql3: changelist schema tweaks.

author: gstein
msg: Add a draft of what the WC's SQLite database would look like. This isn't
fully documented yet since it is a discussion-starter at this point.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc-metadata.sql3: new schema file

author: rhuijben
msg: Avoid calling apr_stat with APR_FINFO_PROT | APR_FINFO_OWNER on Windows, as
this call is 'incredibly expensive, but accurate' and the result is ignored
anyway.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c
(dir_make): Skip trying to set the unavailable sgid flag for WIN32.
This avoids an 'incredibly expensive' ACL retrieval in apr.
* subversion/libsvn_client/export.c
(copy_versioned_files): Call svn_io_dir_make with APR_OS_DEFAULT permissions
to avoid an 'incredibly expensive' ACL retrieval in apr.

author: blair
msg: On the file externals branch.
The merge of tree conflicts now flags a conflict on the switch of a
newly added file which prevents data lose.  Work around this by
preventing a file external to be added if there is a conflict on the
directory and then resolving the conflict on the directory.
* subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(switch_file_external):
If a new file external is being added to the wc, check for a
conflict on the directory before progressing.
In case of an error after switching a newly added file, back out
by removing the entry from revision control instead of reverting
the file.
